long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is used in conjunction with a mobile app for bookmark management to synchronize your browser bookmarks with other devices and browsers.

- First download the app and create an account.

- Use this account to login to the extension.

- Now you can synchronize your bookmarks and have access to these bookmarks through the app.

- Depending on the number of bookmarks, synchronization may take shorter or longer. Please pay attention to the instructions in the notifications.

There are plans to add more functions to the app and to support more browsers and operating systems.
Currently only Android is supported for the app.
The following browsers are supported for the extension: Google Chrome, Chromium, Firefox.
Other browsers based on Firefox or Chromium can also be used, but depending on the changes made there, synchronization may or may not be possible.
Supported languages for bookmarks: English, German.
Please note that only the following folders are synchronized: "Bookmarks bar", "Other bookmarks".
